abstract: Canadian Prime Min Justin Trudeau visits fire-ravaged town of McMurray, Alberta, and credits firefighters for saving much of town; official count shows 2,432 buildings were destroyed by blaze and 25,000 are still standing.
lead_paragraph: As a wildfire threat recedes, the prime minister takes a tour of the scorched community, and pledges speedy federal assistance.

headline.main: Surveying Fire-Ravaged Fort McMurray, Justin Trudeau Praises Responders
headline.print_headline: Trudeau Lauds Rescuers Who Battled to Save Town

snippet: As a wildfire threat recedes, the prime minister takes a tour of the scorched community, and pledges speedy federal assistance.
